speakers.name: Rebecca Murphey
speakers.blurb_md: Senior JS dev at [Bocoup](http://bocoup.com/), client-side architecture fanatic, co-host of the long-lost [yayQuery](http://yayquery.com/) podcast

speakers.name: Chris Wilson
speakers.blurb_md: Chris Wilson has worked on NCSA Mosaic, IE and now Chrome as an Open Web advocate.  He loves enabling awesome user experiences on the web.

speakers.name: Steven Wittens
speakers.blurb_md: [Steven Wittens](Acko.net) is a wannabe demo scener, recreational mathematician and maker of webs front and back who desperately wants the browser to become a real boy already.

speakers.name: John Allsopp
speakers.blurb_md: [John] has been doing things to the web since before many of you were born. This is not necessarily a good thing.
